head.citation-title: Effective factors towards enhancement of environmental awareness in a Thai public company
head.abstracts: © 2017 Taylor & Francis Group.The purpose of this paper is to explore effective factors towards enhancement of environmental awareness in a Thai public company. Environmental awareness has been strongly mentioned in the international agenda, for example Agenda 21, as a tool for environmental problems management. Thailand’s environmental awareness in the business sector has been continuously promoted. The selected study area was an industrial Thai public company. Data collection involved questionnaires comprising 28 and 134 respondents from the managerial and operational level using a stratified sampling method and descriptive statistics for data analysis. The study found that the highest two internal factors considered were ‘Good attitude towards environmental problems and environmental management’ (73.0%) and ‘Intention to change behavior towards being environmentally friendly’ (70.4). ‘Culture that raises people’s environmental responsibility’ (79.30%) and ‘Character of society that builds people’s environmental awareness’ (67.38%) were considered as the highest two external factors. Public participation was recommended to motivate those factors for further study.
